SELECT DISTINCT
COUNTRY AS CODE_ID, COUNTRY AS CODE_NAME
STATE AS CODE_ID, STATE AS CODE_NAME
CITY AS CODE_ID, CITY AS CODE_NAME
POSTCODE AS CODE_ID, POSTCODE AS CODE_NAME
AREA AS CODE_ID, AREA AS CODE_NAME
FROM SYS0064M WHERE STATUS_ID = 1 AND AREA_ID NOT LIKE 'DM%'
AND COUNTRY = #{country}
AND STATE = #{state}
AND CITY = #{city}
AND POSTCODE = #{postcode}
ORDER BY COUNTRY
ORDER BY STATE
ORDER BY CITY
ORDER BY POSTCODE
ORDER BY AREA
